attributes.action: Refrain from replying to our petition against road charges
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mr Blair
         We are not interested in your road charging policies. We would like you to think about the people in this country that need there car for work. These people would be priced out of there jobs with this congestion charge and we the people look at it as another Tax just to pay for your failing policies.
We the people are already the most taxed motorists in the World and think that you should scrap this idea.
We also ask that you should look at rail and bus transport and improve these services before you start with another stupid charge

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
